title: no sound ingame
body: hello everyone, im having abit of a problem. my game has perfect sound pregame and is working normal but as soon as i join in a game i have absolutely no sound and i cant press esc to bring up the options settings for some reason.  sometimes i can still see my taskbar aswell for some reason but thats not constant.any help appreciated,thanks alot

replies.body:
There could be two potential causes for this. Two potential solutions are listed below that I'd like you to try:

1. Install [**this standalone package**](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=34429) from Microsoft to ensure this isn't caused by corrupt/missing assets in your Directx 9c files.

2. If that didn't work, there may be some problems with your user settings file saved server-side. We can complete a reset with the following steps. First, you'll want to **log into the League Client** then minimize it and navigate to your config folder, which should be in the following directory:

>**C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config**

Delete these two files:
**- input.ini
- PersistedSettings.json**

Once you've deleted those files, hop into a custom match alone to confirm the reset worked and your keys work in-game (ESC). Please let me know if this worked for you!
